message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it proposes a novel method for fire detection in still images using color and texture analysis. The paper also mentions the use of super pixel regions, which is a common technique in computer vision. 

The paper may also belong to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category as it deals with the analysis of images and videos. 

The use of machine learning for classification purposes suggests that the paper may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. 

As the paper deals with fire detection, it may also belong to the cryptography and security (cs.CR) sub-category, as fire can be a potential threat to security. 

Finally, the paper may belong to the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with the extraction of relevant information from images and videos.
